job_tasks.phrase: design, build and implement advanced cloud and AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the creation and deployment of technical solutions, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our grid management operations, with a focus on reducing the pressure on scarce staff capacity and advancing the energy transition
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business context and the desired outcomes of the technical solutions, showing an understanding of business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: designing, building, and managing your solutions
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the hands-on development and ongoing management of technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: think along with the team about how we can best use our techniques and tools
job_tasks.justification: This implies understanding the capabilities of technologies and how they can be applied to achieve business objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: You take responsibility for designing, building, and managing your solutions.
how we can best use our techniques and tools

classification.rationale: The job description mentions 'GenAI Acceleration Team' but lacks specific details on the core responsibilities related to GenAI, such as prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning. The focus appears to be on general cloud solutions and business problem-solving rather than specialized GenAI development.
